description: A 3.9% state pension rise acknowledges the role played by older people in society, a charity says.
title: Isle of Man pension rise welcomed by campaigners
title_page: Isle of Man pension rise welcomed by campaigners - BBC News
maintext: Mr Parkin said those who had retired contribute "at both ends of the spectrum" by looking after elderly parents and babysitting grandchildren, as well as spending money in the local economy.
